entry.title: FREEZING RAIN WARNING , Port Elgin
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:14 PM EST Wednesday 18 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Cloudy. Low zero.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Fog patches dissipating overnight. Wind becoming east 20 km/h overnight. Low zero. Forecast issued 10:07 PM EST Wednesday 18 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Snow mixed with freezing rain. Temperature steady near zero.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow or freezing rain at times mixed with ice pellets beginning in the morning. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 50 increasing to 40 gusting to 60 in the morning then becoming southeast 20 gusting to 40 in the afternoon. Temperature steady near zero. Forecast issued 10:07 PM EST Wednesday 18 January 2023
